transcripts.text: what will the children say when the enemy comes to them on that day when the screams of despair echo the streets and torment hunts them on cunning feet?  when few are left in the land they call home and they sit trapped persecuted all alone in a time passed from yours of pleasure and safety
a life of luxury your children never knew because whilst you enjoyed freedom
it was kept only for you.  a life where you would lament at the graves thinking little of the future you eagerly pave.

And now your children spit at your corpse, angry that you never showed them remorse, bitter that you had no urgency to protect.  Instead, your mental virus touched all it could infect.  A disease of vanity and deficient in love, a drug addiction of virtue, preventing you doing what you should.
Selfish, you gluttons, you are now despised.
Your children do hate you and your self-aggrandizing lies.  You left them to suffer like babes in the cold, abandoned in the horror of the depraved and bold.

Who leaves their little ones to cry in the dark, surrounded by predators like a circling shark?  who absorbs all the happiness and luxury for now, like a grotesque and selfish masochistic fat cow.  What will they think?
What will the children say when the savages come for them on that dreadful day?

And as they are tortured and they scream to the skies, begging for God to just let them die, and the angels come down, to wipe away their tears, to soothe them to eternal rest from their fears.  What of you, the bloated fools, filling the fat graves of selfish mules?

What have you to say to them now?  Will you crawl for forgiveness, wretched and bow?  Are there any words which could comfort the result of your selfish disregard and narcissistic cult?  for every bone in their bodies broken every abusive word to them spoken every rape and torment of their souls every cut and bruise maiming or whole every murder and brutally beat it all lies dead and cold at your feet.
you are the creator of this pain.
You thought you could place the burden on them after having your fun never caring for the win.
So what is it that the children will say when for your selfishness they're forced to pay?

They'll curse you and hate you, you deserve to know, for they shall reap what the selfish do so.  Your children, your babes, you left them in the cold for your pleasure and virtue to the devil you sold.  If not for God to take them, they'd know no love at all.  For they are your children, the abused, the children of the fall.

What would the children say to you?  Why have you abandoned us?  You surely must hate us too.  What makes you feel more depraved and ashamed than to cause the suffering to those you birthed and never saved?
